content.rendered:
Please reach out to us via phone, email, or in person.

Phone:
(888) 708-0808 Email:
info@sientra.com Location:
Tiger Aesthetics Medical, LLC
9630 South 54th Street
Franklin, WI 53132

PRODUCT INFORMATION

We’d love to connect with you! Click here to request more information about our products or to be connected with your local territory manager.

MEDICAL INFORMATION REQUESTS

If you have a medical or scientific inquiry regarding a Tiger Aesthetics product, please complete this electronic form: Medical Information Request
This form is intended for healthcare providers only. If you are a patient seeking information about a specific product or condition, please consult with your healthcare provider.

PRODUCT COMPLAINTS

Please fill out this form to submit a complaint.
